imgDesc.text: Court of Fontaine: Court Region Waterway Hub

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The job of an aquabus maintenance worker isn't easy. When they're not already fixing something, they're constantly on edge, waiting for news of something else that's gone wrong to arrive any minute... It's at times like these that focusing on a few rounds of Genius Invokation TCG helps take their minds off it all.
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the battle begins, all characters on both sides gain 1 Energy. Each Round, 1 Piercing DMG will be dealt to all of the characters of the first player to declare the end of their Round.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
